verses.1: Zion a kihotkhiatna thu khuavak bangin a taankhiat mateng, ama gualzawhna thu meivak kuang bangin a taankhiat matengin, Zion ka ngaihsutna-in gamdai takin ka om mawk kei dinga, Jerusalem ka ngaihsutna-in ka khawl mawk kei ding hi.
verses.2: Minamte in na gualzawhna mu ding uh a, kumpi khempeuh in na minthanna mu ding uh hi. Topa in nang a hong phuah min thak tawh nang hong kisam ding hi.
verses.3: Nang pen Topa adingin hotkhiatna lukhu, na Pasian adingin kumpi lukhu tawh na kibang ding hi.
verses.4: Nang pen a kinusia, hong kici nawn lo dinga, na leitang pen Gamkhing, kici nawn lo ding hi. Nang pen ama tungah ka lungkimna om, hong kici dinga, na leitang pen a Kiteen pih, kici ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang tungah Topa lungkim a, na leitang pen a kiteen pih zi tawh kibang ding hi.
verses.5: Bang hang hiam cih leh tangval in nungak khat a teenpih mah bangin nang hong lam pa in nang hong teenpih dinga, zipi pa mothak nu tungah a lungdam mah bangin nang tungah na Pasian lungdam ding hi.
verses.6: Jerusalem aw, na kulhte tungah galvilte ka koih khin a, sun tawntung le zan tawntungin amaute gamdai ngei lo ding uh hi. Amaute in a thuciamna Topa phawksak ding uh a, amah in Jerusalem kipsakin leitung miteʼ phat dingin a bawlkik matengin amaute khawl lo ding uh hi.
verses.8: Topa in limtakin thuciamna bawl khinzo a, a vangliatna tawh tungsak ding hi. “Na galteʼ an dingin na ante ka piakik nawn kei dinga, nangma sep sa leenggahzu gamdang mite in dawn nawn lo ding hi.
verses.9: Ahih hangin an a kholte in ne-in Topa na phat ding uh a, a kaikhawmte in keima biakinn huang sungah a dawn ding uh hi,” ci hi.
verses.10: Jerusalem mite aw, kulh kongpite panin paikhia unla a hong ciahkik na mipihte uh adingin lam bawl khol un. Lam zik un; lam lianpi zikin suangtumte paikhia unla, miteʼ muh dingin lim khat khai to un.
verses.11: Leimong dongah Topa taangko khin hi. Jerusalem mite tungah, “En un, no hong hon khia pa hong pai hi. Ama sep thaman a mite hong pua a, a gualzawhna thaman a mite hong masuan hi,” ci un.
verses.12: Amaute pen A Siangtho Mi, Topa ’ Hotkhiatte kici dinga, nang pen A kizong khia, a kinusia lo khuapi, hong kici ding hi.
